content: I'm getting excited about my upcoming trip to Grayson Highlands State Park. Speaking of trips, I went on a solo fishing trip to Lake Troutman back in early April. It was a great experience, and I even saw a bald eagle swooping down to grab a fish right out of the water nearby. Anyway, back to my question - do you know if there are any good fishing spots near the campsite we're planning to stay at?
